title: Selcouth
description: A clean, elegant site exploring uncommon aesthetics.

title: Maleeha Cafe
description: Maleeha Cafe is more than just a coffee shop — a warm, Yemen-inspired space and comfortable sanctuary for women, girls, and children, with authentic Adani Chai and a dedicated kids playground.

title: Crossroads - Drinks & Desserts
description: A bilingual menu site for Crossroads Drinks & Desserts (Umm Al Quwain) — ‘Midnight Cravings’ with signature desserts and exclusive drinks, homemade with love.

title: ORO Coffee
description: A modern premium café landing page for ORO Coffee (Umm Al-Quwain) — a refined coffee ritual with premium ingredients, modern comfort, and offerings from espresso to matcha and signature refreshments.

title: Portfolio Website
description: This site — a responsive, SEO‑friendly personal portfolio featuring a built‑in AI Assistant chatbot powered by Google Gemini.

title: The Nobles of Sudan - أشراف السودان
description: The official historical and genealogical website of the Nobles of Sudan (أشراف السودان), documenting their Hashemite lineage, families, and heritage — with an Express + Node.js backend powering a staff admin portal to add/edit/delete certificates and a public verification page.

title: The Official Website of Shaykh Dr. Khālid al-Ḥāyik
description: A dedicated site presenting the work, teachings, and publications of Shaykh Dr. Khālid al-Ḥāyik, with curated articles, lectures, and resources.

title: VeoCreator
description: An AI‑powered video generation tool that uses Google Gemini’s Veo 3 model to turn your text prompts into videos. Compose scenes, iterate styles, and refine outputs — coming soon.
